metadata.title: CVE-2013-2600 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
MiniUPnPd has information disclosure use of snprintf()

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-2600` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

miniupnpd - 1.8.20130730-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: miniupnpd package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.8.20130730-2').
